sub_title: Expert Lead Transformation at ING Belgium
summary:
I am an experienced international change & project manager in the financial industry, specialized in change management in a retail banking environment, with a strong focus on digitalization of processes and customer journeys . Furthermore, Being a LSS Blackbelt my primary focus is on continuous process improvements and excellence. Always striving for best-in-class customer service.

I studied internationally, attending International Business Schools in Groningen and Paris. Including an internship in Belgium for IBM.  I started working at ING during my bachelor studies to gain valuable work experience and thanks to many opportunities I still enjoy working for ING until this day.

People describe me as creative, diplomatic, analytical, thorough and original. I get a lot of energy from working on ambitious or complex projects, public speaking, and creative design. In my private life, I am really passionate about cars (Driving, detailing, fixing and enjoying) and traveling the world with my girlfriend and dogs.

The main aim behind the course is creating more awareness about their spending and risks. '}]
